hotkey.-h: This command contains subcommands for setting up hotkeys

usbc.-h: Sets the hotkey for switching input devices to USB-C

flags.name: --reset
flags.description: Resets the hotkey for switching to USB-C

flags.name: --listen
flags.description: Listens for a key combination, sets as hotkey for switching to USB-C

flags.description: Listens for a key combination, sets as hotkey for switching to Display Port
